channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Maybe don't trust every Windows Update without checking - hackers hijack images to spread dangerous malware
item.description: Hackers use fake Windows Update screens and steganographic images to deliver multi-stage malware that executes silently through deceptive command prompts.

item.title: Black Friday Cdiscount : le top départ est donné, voici les premières vraies offres
item.description: Cdiscount n'a pas la patience d'attendre vendredi. Le géant bordelais vient d'ouvrir les vannes de son Black Friday avec une agressivité habituelle sur la tech. On a épluché des centaines de pages pour ne garder que les vraies baisses de prix.

item.title: Malicious Blender model files deliver StealC infostealing malware
item.description: Another open source platform being abused to infect users with infostealers.

item.title: I've hand-picked 28 of the best Black Friday kitchen appliance deals from Ninja, Breville, KitchenAid and more
item.description: Black Friday Kitchen deals are the perfect opportunity to restock and refresh your kitchen countertops, and with these hand-picked deals, you're in for a tasty treat.

item.title: Amazon AU's Black Friday deals include record low prices on select items – I've filtered out the best 170+ offers you can nab right now
item.description: With Black Friday here now, there's just four days left to shop all the best Amazon deals on Kindles, air fryers, vacuums, phones, cameras and more.

item.title: Missouri to enforce mandatory age verification in three days
item.description: Missouri is the latest US state to enforce age verification legislation, and it's set to provoke yet another surge in VPN usage. Here's what's at stake for your privacy, and what you can do about it.

item.title: ‘The Host’ Showing Off Its Kaiju in Broad Daylight Is Still a Huge Flex Worth Celebrating
item.description: Bong Joon Ho's first monster film defied creature-feature convention while delivering heart, horror, and humor that endures nearly 20 years later.

item.title: The 40 Best Movies on HBO Max Right Now (December 2025)
item.description: Materialists, Eddington, and Elf are just a few of the movies you should be watching on HBO Max this month.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Friday, November 28 (game #901)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Friday, November 28 (game #635)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Friday, November 28 (game #1404)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: This Thanksgiving’s real drama may be Michael Burry versus Nvidia
item.description: Is Burry the canary in the coal mine, warning of a collapse that's inevitable? Or could his fame, his track record, his now unrestricted voice, and a fast-growing audience trigger the very implosion he's predicting?

item.title: Amazon's rival to Starlink offers "fastest downloads and uploads" - but how will it stack up in real life?
item.description: Amazon pushes Leo Ultra into enterprise testing with high-speed claims, direct AWS links, and expanding satellite coverage.

item.title: I've struggled to recommend the iPhone 16e, but this Black Friday discount makes it a no brainer
item.description: The iPhone 16e is pretty expensive for what it is, which makes this £100 Black Friday discount a welcome sight

item.title: Black Friday weekend is finally here – from thousands of offers, I've collected the top 165+ tech deals worth your dosh
item.description: This year's Black Friday sale sees massive savings on Apple, Samsung, Google, Dyson, Sony, Bose, SharkNinja and more.

item.title: The Story of How Cats Conquered the World Just Got Weirder
item.description: Scientists have found genetic evidence that cat domestication didn't start as early as commonly assumed.

item.title: Dreame’s X40 Ultra is arguably the best robovac deal you can grab for Black Friday
item.description: Robot vacuums show up in our gift guides almost every year, and it’s easy to understand why: they clean, they save time, and they’re cheaper than hiring a professional. But not all robovacs are created equal, and some save more time than others. The Dreame X40 Ultra is one of those, offering a more genuinely […]

item.title: As a tech editor, I found 40+ Black Friday tech deals Id recommend to friends and family: Apple, Samsung, DJI, Nintendo on sale
item.description: Our tech editor handpicked the best Black Friday tech deals. Save $330 on Dyson vacuums, $250 on MacBook Air laptops, and up to 55% on Amazon devices.

item.title: This De'Longhi electric radiator saved me from a wintery grave when my heating broke, and right now it's 55% off
item.description: It's bloody freezing, but this steamy Black Friday deal knocks 55% off the electric radiator I recommend to everyone I know
